name: The Indestructible Sentient Explosive Barrel
description:
Made for Bored Pixels Jam 8

WARNING: this game's screen spins a lot.

Take control of an explosive red barrel as you explode every being that dares cross through your structure, hero or enemy alike. It's payback time for being used like a prop.

Watch out though, you're still bound by the laws of physics, and can be tossed around by all the intruders running around.

Kill enough Heroes and Enemies as quick as possible to satiate your destructive appetite.

The Indestructible Sentient Explosive Barrel Controls:

WASD - move

Space - jump

Enter - explode
